resources.string: Welcome to RedTroops SDK Test App
Hey there! Check out our HTML5 Interstitial Ad. You basically can place text, images, videos, buttons and what ever you want into this advertisement.
Below are the native ads which come in 3:2 and 4:1 aspect ratios inside your ViewGroups.
The Banner advertisement. This advertisement is an overlay advertisement that goes usually at the top or the bottom of the activity.

To get one of those on the screen, call:

RedTroops.getInstance
(Context).showBanner
(Activity, Gravity);
